discourse_list.title: Seeking community members interested in podcasting

content.content: Do you find yourself rambling to family members or friends about the benefits of blockchain, DeFi, or MakerDAO? Need an outlet for all of your wild ideas about where this technology will take us? If you’ve ever thought about podcasting, here’s your opportunity! The Content team currently distributes an audio version of governance updates and would like to expand into other types of audio content. Audio content is uploaded via Anchor.FM, which helps us publish to:  Spotify Google Podcasts Breaker Pocket Casts Radio Public  We’re looking for individuals interested in hosting podcasts featuring different types of content on a weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly basis. Whether you’re interested in doing news updates, interviewing guests, or have a different format you want to try out, we would like to offer help to hosts interested in producing content. Publishing insightful content offers newcomers a chance to explore DeFi and helps position MakerDAO as an authority on topics relating to DAOs and DeFi. We can offer as much or as little help as needed:  Pre-production  Format & Development   Production  Script writing Brainstorming new segments Tracking analytics Creating promotional materials Scheduling guests    If you have ideas about the types of content that could be useful, without being further involved, please feel free to leave them in the comments. You can also message me here or on rocket (@jerry.g), if you prefer to talk privately.
One of my favorite financial podcasts is Bloomburg’s Odd Lots.
Maybe the nascent Speaker Series could be extended into a podcast?
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
